item.title: [PI]server message help send PER ONE
item.dc:creator: @bwukk bwukk
item.description:
@bwukk wrote:

Doesnt have to be random.(Can be)
I want it so it sends ONE message each time. Now it kinda takes one more message everytime it sends. so it ends up with about 6 messages.

So basicly i want it to send ONE message after that the next message ONLY ONE etc

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]server message help send PER ONE
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Jay Sir Jay
item.description:
@Sir_Jay wrote:

Oh you want it to be random? So every 100000ms one message is sent?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]server message help send PER ONE
item.dc:creator: @bwukk bwukk
item.description:
@bwukk wrote:

[quote=“Sir Jay, post:4, topic:374673”]public void Servermessage() { EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() { public void execute(EventContainer c) { sendMessage("[<col=65280>SERVER NOTICE]: <col= 65535>This message should send first JUST THIS ONE"); } }, 100000); EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() { public void execute(EventContainer c) { sendMessage("[<col=65280>SERVER NOTICE]: <col= 65535>Then this message should come next JUST THIS ONE and so on.."); } }, 200000); };[/quote]

Then it sends first the first message and after that it will send the 2th message WITH the first message.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]server message help send PER ONE
item.dc:creator: @bwukk bwukk
item.description:
@bwukk wrote:

i want to make my server message send per each message OR random.
at the moment my server message sends all message at once which is pretty horrible.

this is my servermessage sender

public void Servermessage() { EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() { public void execute(EventContainer c) { sendMessage("[<col=65280>SERVER NOTICE]: <col= 65535>This message should send first JUST THIS ONE"); sendMessage("[<col=65280>SERVER NOTICE]: <col= 65535>Then this message should come next JUST THIS ONE and so on.."); } }, 100000); };

Read full topic
